name: Loopclear
description:
-- Highly recommended to play the PC version (standalone downloadable) as in web browser the performance/quality is lower --

The end is the beginning, and the beginning is the end.

MAIN CONTROLS

Move: "WASD"
Jump: "SPACE"
Use: "F"

MAGNETIC HOOK CONTROLS
Move: "WASD"
Move UP/DOWN: "Q/E"
Release barrel: "SPACE"
